Module Robotinterface
Package robotinterface.motors

Interface Servo

All Superinterfaces:
Motor
All Known Implementing Classes:
ServoComponent
public interface Servo
extends Motor

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    double getCurrentServoAngle()
    Get the current servo's angle.
    double getMaxFlexibleAngle()
    Get the maximum possible angle value to control.
    double getMinFlexibleAngle()
    Get the minimal possible angle value to control.
    double getServoSpeed()
    Get the servo speed – either the default speed or the set speed, if this servo supports flexible servo speeds.
    void setDefaultServoSpeed()
    Set the servo's default speed.
    void setServoSpeed​(double servoSpeed, boolean exceptionIfLimitsExceeded)
    Set the servo speed.
    void setTargetAngle​(double targetAngle)
    Set the target angle to which the servo should move.
    boolean supportedServoAngle​(double angle)
    Detects, whether the given angle is allowed by this servo, i.e. not NaN inside the range of supported angles

    Methods inherited from interface robotinterface.motors.Motor

    currentSpeedPortion, getCurrentValue, getDescription, getID, getMaxFlexibleSpeed, getMaxFlexibleValue, getMinFlexibleSpeed, getMinFlexibleValue, getSpeed, hasFlexibleSpeed, isMoving, nearlyReached, secondsToTarget, setDefaultSpeed, setSpeed, setTargetValue, supportedValue, waitTargetNearlyReached, waitTargetReached

  • Method Details

    • getCurrentServoAngle

      double getCurrentServoAngle()
      Get the current servo's angle.
      Returns:
      current servo angle (in radians)

    • setTargetAngle

      void setTargetAngle​(double targetAngle)

      Set the target angle to which the servo should move.

      Parameters:
      targetAngle - target angle (in radians)

    • supportedServoAngle

      boolean supportedServoAngle​(double angle)
      Detects, whether the given angle is allowed by this servo, i.e.
      • not NaN
      • inside the range of supported angles
      Parameters:
      angle - servo angle
      Returns:
      true if allowed

    • getServoSpeed

      double getServoSpeed()
      Get the servo speed – either the default speed or the set speed, if this servo supports flexible servo speeds.
      Returns:
      speed in radians per second

    • setServoSpeed

      void setServoSpeed​(double servoSpeed, boolean exceptionIfLimitsExceeded)
      Set the servo speed. This is only supported, if this servo supports flexible servo speeds.
      Parameters:
      servoSpeed - speed in radians per second
      exceptionIfLimitsExceeded - if true an exception is thrown if the speed limits are exceeded; if false, the speed is always mapped to the valid range

    • setDefaultServoSpeed

      void setDefaultServoSpeed()
      Set the servo's default speed. This method also is successful for servos that to do not support flexible speed.

    • getMinFlexibleAngle

      double getMinFlexibleAngle()
      Get the minimal possible angle value to control.
      Returns:
      minimal angle in radians

    • getMaxFlexibleAngle

      double getMaxFlexibleAngle()
      Get the maximum possible angle value to control.
      Returns:
      maximum angle in radians
